Summary: THOUGHT AIRPLANE HEADLIGHTS THEN NO VISIBLE BEACON LIGHTS LOW ALTITUDE NEAR I25
divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS HAVING A SMOKE STARGAZING @ TEN O'CLOCK IN JOHNSTOWN WHEN I THOUGHT I NOTICED A JETHEADLIGHTS AT ABOUT I25 BELOW SOME STARS I WAS LOOKIG AT. THE OBJECT MOVED NORTH AND CAME EAST STRAIGHT TOWARDS ME . IT SLOWED TO A HOVER?? ABOUT ALMOST RIGHT ABOVE ME FOR ABOUT 10 SECONDS THEN MOVED NORTH NORTH EAST UNTILL IT WAS OUT OF VIEW NEAR WINDSOR. WHEN IT CAME TOWARDS ME I GOT THE FEELING OF BEING LOOKED AT I GOT CHILLS AND STOOD DUMBFOUNDED AND EXCITED PLUS ON EDGE THE OBJECT APPEARED TO ME TO HAVE A GREEN SHAPE?GLOW IN THE MIDDLE AS IT HOVERED AT SMALL AIRCRAFT ALTITUDE?WHATEVER IT WAS I WILL KEEP ON STARGAZING
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
